content: i have seen a bunch of tiny crochet fidget toy patterns and those are great for stealth fidgeting but i got interested in making a bigger fluffier one because of the mobius construction you can pull the ruffle through the center opening well forever this type of crochet fidget toy has a couple of extra benefits it s soft and pretty quiet to pay with unbreakable and washable when you make it in acrylic yarn like i did
